name: 9.21 "It's a Wonderful Wife" Online Trivia | 'Cheers'- Season 9 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Norm said that Cliff got "skunked". However, when Cliff started to cough a whistle blew, so Woody said, "Mr. Clavin got the whistle!"

questions.text: It was implied that Sam slept with who in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Hill's hatcheck girl.

	Sam told Hill it was Hill's fault. He said, "I wouldn't touch your hatcheck girl if you hired some decent waitresses."

Frasier.

	Woody found out because Frasier left his wallet behind the night before. Woody also questioned Frasier about the fact that Frasier would donate his organs in the case of an accident.

questions.text: Who asked what was sold at "Pizza, Pizza, Pizza"?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Carla called him a "dweeb". Woody told her he'd never been there before.

questions.text: Who was Woody paying to photograph him?
questions.explanation:
Henri.

	Woody figured since Henri just took his money all the time anyway, this way Henri wouldn't owe it back. Lilith was surprised that Woody would let Henry photograph him.

questions.text: What did Lilith say happened whenever her picture was taken?
questions.correct: She looked as white as a ghost.
options: The picture was always double exposed.
questions.explanation:
She looked as white as a ghost.

	This was funny to everyone else since she always looked as white as a ghost. She was going to have Henri take her picture.

questions.text: Why didn't Woody drink Henri's club soda?
questions.explanation:
It would be wrong.

	Woody paid for the club soda so technically it was his. On top of that, Henri left him at the bar when he was supposed to take photographs of him.

questions.text: Where did Vera get a job?
questions.explanation:
Melville's.

	Norm couldn't deal with his wife working so close. He ran out of the bar screaming.

questions.text: What was Norm's real first name?
questions.explanation:
Hillary.

	Vera told Rebecca Norm's real first name. Of course, the guys harassed him about it.

questions.text: Why was Norm angry with John Allen Hill?
options: Hill wouldn't give Norm his leftovers.
questions.explanation:
Hill insulted Vera.

	Norm usually insulted his wife, but he loved her and got upset when anyone else insulted her. He didn't go to Vera when she was crying outside on the stairs, however.  He just waited for her to leave.
